text.div:
BCProviderRegistry

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/provider/ImplementationGuide/fhir.ca-bc.provider

FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Provider Registry

name: BCProviderRegistry
title: BC Provider Location Registry FHIR Implementation Guide
description: FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Provider Registry

resource.name: BCAddress
resource.description: Adds an end reason, communication purpose and validation status to the address.

resource.name: BCBatchBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the PLR Batch operation.

resource.name: BCContactPoint
resource.description: Adds an end reason and extra contact information.

resource.name: BCHumanName
resource.description: Adds an end reason and a use code to a name.

resource.name: BCIdentifier
resource.description: Adds an end reason to the identifier.

resource.name: BCLocation
resource.description: General constraints on the Location resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project.

resource.name: BCLocationBundle
resource.description: A bundle that submits Location information.

resource.name: BCOperationOutcome
resource.description: OperationOutcome for BC.

resource.name: BCOrganization
resource.description: General constraints on the Organization resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project.

resource.name: BCOrganizationAffiliation
resource.description: General constraints on the OrganizationAffiliation resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project.

resource.name: BCOrganizationBundle
resource.description: A bundle that submits Organization and OrganizationAffiliation information.

resource.name: BCPractitioner
resource.description: General constraints on the Practitioner resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project.

resource.name: BCPractitionerBundle
resource.description: A bundle that submits Practitioner and PractitionerRole information.

resource.name: BCPractitionerRole
resource.description: General constraints on the PractitionerRole resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project.

resource.name: BCRoleRelationships
resource.description: General constraints on the PractitionerRole resource for use in the BC Provider Registry project to describe relationships.

resource.name: BC Address Validataion Extension
resource.description: BC extension for address validation status codes.

resource.name: BC Birth Place Extension
resource.description: Captures the place where a patient/practitioner/person was born.

resource.name: BC Birth Time Extension
resource.description: Adds birth time to the birth date.

resource.name: BC Communication Purpose Extension
resource.description: BC extension for communication purpose codes.

resource.name: BC Facility Community Health Service Area Extension
resource.description: A code that represents the community health service area that the location is a part of.

resource.name: BC Practitioner Date of Death Extension
resource.description: The Date of Death of a Practitioner.

resource.name: BC End Reason Extension
resource.description: Tracking end reason.

resource.name: BC Facility Details Extension
resource.description: Provides the details of a facility as represented by a FHIR location.

resource.name: BC License Status Extension
resource.description: Tracking the status and changes to the status of a practitioner/organization license.

resource.name: BC Practitioner to Location Type Extension.
resource.description: The relationship type of a Practitioner to Location relationship.

resource.name: BC Facility Mailing Address Extension
resource.description: An optional mailing address for the facility.

resource.name: BC Name Use Extension
resource.description: Allows for use on a simple name string.

resource.name: BC Notes Extension
resource.description: Notes about the practitioner/location/organization.

resource.name: BC Owner Extension
resource.description: Tracking the owner.

resource.name: BC Valid Period Extension
resource.description: The period for when the extended element is valid.

resource.name: BC Practitioner Conditions Extension
resource.description: Conditions on the provider's role

resource.name: BC Practitioner Confidentiality Extension
resource.description: Indicates the confidentiality of the practitioner's information.

resource.name: BC Practitioner Disciplinary Actions Extension
resource.description: Provides details of disciplinary actions against the provider.

resource.name: BC Practitioner Qualification Extension
resource.description: The qualifications extensions.

resource.name: BC Practitioner to Practitioner Relationship Extension
resource.description: Allows for relationships of practitioners to practitioners without needing CareTeam semantics.

resource.name: BC Practitioner to Organization or Practitioner to Practitioner Type Extension.
resource.description: The relationship type of a Practitioner to Organization or Practitioner to Practitioner relationship.

resource.name: BC Specialty Source Extension
resource.description: The specialty source.

resource.name: BC Expertise Value Set
resource.description: BC Expertise value set.

resource.name: Practitioner Role Code Value Set
resource.description: BC Practitioner Role Codes

resource.name: BC-Specific Practitioner Role Codes
resource.description: BC-Specific codes for practitioner roles

resource.description: Example Parameters for Add Individual Provider response.

resource.description: Example of a Bundle of resources that are needed to update an Organization.

resource.name: Distribution
resource.description: This operation is used to distribute the resources that represent a Provider or Facility.

resource.name: EntityLocationQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for an location and will return the information for that location without following associations to other practitioner, organizations, or locations.

resource.name: EntityOrganizationQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for an organization and will return the information for that organization without following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

resource.name: EntityPractitionerQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for a practitioner and will return the information for that practitioner without following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

resource.name: ExtendedLocationQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for an location and will return the information for that location along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other providers, organizations, or location.

resource.name: ExtendedOrganizationQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for an organization and will return the information for that organization along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other practitioners, organizations, or locations.

resource.name: ExtendedPractitionerQuery
resource.description: This operation is used to query for a provider and will return the information for that provider along with any instances that can be found by following associations to other providers, organizations, or facilities.

resource.name: Maintain
resource.description: This operation is used to create and update the resources that represent a Provider or Facility.

resource.name: BCPLRClientCapabilityStatement
resource.description:
This capability statement describes the use case that is supported by the BC FHIR implementation of PLR.

* Distributions - used when PLR is communicating a change in a single Practitioner, Organization, or Location

resource.name: BCPLRServerCapabilityStatement
resource.description:
This capability statement describes the three use cases that are supported by the BC FHIR implementation of PLR.

* Maintain - used when an external source is communicating a change to PLR
* Batch - allows for the sending of multiple Maintain transactions at one time
* Queries - a set of operations are defined that allow the querying of PLR FHIR instances

page.title: Transition from V3 Provider to FHIR
